Headline: Growth Strategist & Business Builder | GTM, Product, Partnerships | Founder @ Conwert.in | Fintech, Proptech, F&B | Ex-EnKash, OYO, IWG | UCLA PGP
Comment:
I used to agree to this saying of 'you are who you surround yourself with' till a while back Avik Ashar. 
I don't anymore. 
I started to realise that if I'm dependent on others to get something done, it won't happen. If I have to make changes in my life, I do it irrespective of what others around me are doing. 
Maybe you can be the one bringing change in the people around you. What say?
